title: How to Remove Ink Stains from Clothes with OxiClean™ Versatile Stain Remover
description:
Uh oh! Ink stains on your shirt? Don’t worry, use OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover to get them out. Problem solved! 

Watch our video to learn how to remove ink stains from clothes. OxiClean helpful tip: For best results, presoak clothing in OxiClean Versatile Stain Remover for 1-6 hours before washing with detergent and OxiClean.
